query:
SELECT 
    id as CAMPAIGN_ID,
    name,
    slug,
    organizerEmail
FROM campaigns 
WHERE slug = 'rafael';

    id as CAMPAIGN_ID,
    name,
    slug,
    organizerEmail
FROM campaigns
